subsections.cancellationPeriod: Customers may cancel their order within 1 hour of placing it, provided that the order has not yet been shipped or processed.
subsections.cancellationProcess: To cancel an order, please contact our Customer Support team via phone at +9172001 50577. You will receive a confirmation of your cancellation request.
subsections.refundUponCancellation: If your order is canceled within the specified time frame and has not been processed, a full refund will be issued to the original payment method.

subsections.returnEligibility: We accept returns for a refund or exchange on damaged or defective products or if you received the wrong item. You must report the issue within 1 day of receiving the product.
subsections.returnProcess: To initiate a return, please contact our Customer Support team via phone at +9172001 50577. You will be provided with return instructions.
subsections.refundProcess: Upon receipt and inspection of the returned item, we will process your refund to the original payment method or provide a replacement, as per your request.

subsections.cancellationRefunds: Refunds for canceled orders are typically processed within 1 business day, though it may take longer to appear on your bank statement.
subsections.returnRefunds: Refunds for returned items are typically processed within 1 business day of our receipt and inspection of the returned product.

subsections.cancellationShipping: If you cancel your order before it is shipped, you will receive a full refund, including shipping charges.
subsections.returnShipping: Customers are responsible for return shipping costs unless the return is due to a product defect or an error on our part.

contactInformation.title: Contact Information
contactInformation.message: If you have any questions or need further assistance regarding cancellations or refunds, please contact our Customer Support team via phone at +9172001 50577.

changesToPolicy.title: Changes to This Policy
changesToPolicy.message: We reserve the right to make changes to this Cancellation and Refund policy.
